name: Real, Merino, Barreras & Asociados Correduría de Seguros y Reaseguros SA
goal: RMB - Insurance Brokers is a global professional services firm (Brokerage) founded in 1954. Focused on Aquaculture Insurance + Specialty Risks Solutions, we help our clients to identify, plan, and respond to risks on a global and integrated way.
interests: Banking and financial services, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: As stated on the filed above, we are specialized in providing aquaculture insurance solutions with a global scope. Due to  our continuous contact with aqua farmers we are aware of the numerous burdens the aquaculture sector confronts. From RMB, we are always available for helping out on any initiative that could allow the EU to explode its outstanding aquaculture assets such as technical knowledge, experience, top tier players, etc
